reviews.text: Great location and the suites are sizable and nicely appointed. The main downside is that on the weekends the hotel hosts DJs and the music can be heard on the top floor. So don't expect peace and quiet.
reviews.title: Loud, Gen Y

reviews.text: Still a great place to stay in Laax. Nice modern and comfortable rooms. Cool bar to grab a drink after returning from the slopes or before dinner. Nice atmosphere and friendly service. Walking distance from the lifts.
reviews.title: Stylish ski hotel

reviews.text: I think it is the best lobby bar ,not only in Laax but in the entire Alps. Stuff is more than friendly, even they are one of my friends :) A very good looking place with a very good location.I am visiting Laax every year and Definately this Hotel will be my only choice always. thank you.
reviews.title: My only choice if it is Laax

reviews.text: great place and very cosy lobby & bar, clean rooms, smiley people, perfect snow, lots of fun and party, high security, lots of young people, good music, nice colors and floor lightnings, easy to manage and in the center of the town. 5 minutes walk from the lifts, good restaurants are in close by and nice shopping area.
reviews.title: great place very cosy
TOP quality/price in Laax
reviews.text: Modern building, good quality of service, rooms are clean and very comfortable.
